BIO

Jai Karan is a young entrepreneur from hyderabad running his own confectionary and is also a freelance photographer and an upcoming music artist who developed his interest for photography and music in his early teens and has been pursuing his passion behind the lens ever since. In 2019 he released his first music single named ‘’ray of light’’. Jai Karan’s work can be found in a number of outlets but a notable achievement for this Indian was having his work featured on two special collection coins issued by THE RESERVE BANK OF INDIA..

2017 - Current

SUCRE BAKEHOUSE

Founder & CEO

Sucre bakehouse is a chain of confectionary stores in Hyderabad which sell premium cookies and brownies which is leading in its industry.

2015 - 2017

Republic Records

Hip Hop Artist

Jai Karan under the name of Airan Jack is a signed artist from republic records which is a record label.

2012 - 2015

3rd eye co.

Photographer

3rd eye co. is a photography firm where professional models hire the photographers to make a model portfolio for them.
